ygData.subject: RE: What happened to the forge?
ygData.msgSnippet:
Armor of Ro only requires 2 slots = mold and ronium

-----Original Message-----
From: Paul Heenan [mailto:pheenan@turner-industries.com]
Sent: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
Armor of Ro only requires 2 slots = mold and ronium

-----Original Message-----
From: Paul Heenan [mailto:pheenan@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 2:15 PM
To: 'eq_blacksmiths@onelist.com'
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] What happened to the forge?


Ok, what exactly happened in the patch yesterday? I went to make a suit of
banded and when I clicked on the forge it now has 10 slots! Did they add
something and not tell us? What is out there that needs 10 slots to create?
Is this just part of the Paladin armor quest I have been reading about? I
looked all over several cities to see if any new molds were there and found
nothing. If anybody knows the reasoning behind this, please post.

Drizben D'Vorn
Master Smith on Brell Serilis
